title: New Eve's voice lines are amazing; thank you to all involved who created 'em.
body:
Eve was already a great character through theme; a sexy, sassy, badass demon chick that got shit done.

New Eve is that but sooooo much better. <3
I'm just sitting here, listening to her voice lines and I'm like, "Yeah. Yes! I want her to hurt me! I want her to hurt me and for me to love every second of it!"

This is some kinky shit yo and I honestly am loving every moment of it!
Best part of the Evelynn rework are her voice lines, hands down. (Or hooves in Hecarim's case.)

In case you haven't heard them yet, go listen to them!
This is great, I'm loving it!

replies.body: Evelynn loves you, too <3
Can you give us some examples of 'rejected' lines that were considered?
I listened to all of Eve's new voice lines, but I can't find "It takes a lot of effort to move like this in heels." Is it a joke line or a movement line, or was it scrapped?

I haven't watched all of the skin spotlight videos yet, but it's possible it could be skin exclusive. I imagine tango eve. Or it could be one of the idle/move vo's. I'm pretty sure they said it was staying in tho.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot OwleyCat,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mQANIqOA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-26T23:55:59.826+0000)
>
> Evelynn loves you, too <3



Interesting how you reply to the guy who likes the crass, juvenile sex innuendo lines, but ignore all those who protest it.
https://g.redditmedia.com/9aeOInllhZ2qgS4lEdOUi4VzcCaw7BTFsC1UsaX1iOI.gif?s=7d169d9e105f644d08d1b4475ad2dba9
Wow, you sure add a lot to the discussion! Compelling argument you make here!
The same one I'd give to a child throwing a fit in the store~

Thank you, I feel very listened to. I'm sorry I hold League in such high regard that I am worried about what's happening to it.

Please, dismiss my concern as a childish tantrum and demean my opinion! That'll make me go away eventually, so it's a good idea.

Perhaps if you presented your opinion in a more appropriate and mature manner people would be more willing to listen to you.
There's a proper etiquacy one really should have when attempting to appeal to a crowd; even if it's one as small as this thread is concerned.

> [{quoted}](name=Vhan8765,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mQANIqOA,comment-id=0000000400000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-27T09:34:12.606+0000)
>
> Perhaps if you presented your opinion in a more appropriate and mature manner people would be more willing to listen to you.
> There's a proper etiquacy one really should have when attempting to appeal to a crowd; even if it's one as small as this thread is concerned.


This coming from someone who replied only with a meme picture of salt.

Perhaps follow your own advice.

Mutual respect~

Widen your vocabulary hun.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

EDIT: Plus too, it's late and I'm having my fun. My opinion was this post, and it reached who I wanted it to fine.
You're just some dude with an opinion differing from my own, which is fine of course but again, could've been worded better.
Yeah, English isn't my first language, but I'm not quite sure your comment here made any sense.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
Giving up entirely on grammar and language, then? Suits you just fine.
one question: when/why did evelynn get changed from half vampire to demon?
As one of her artist I really enjoyed what you did to her splashes, you and LoneWingy did a great job for visual direction

> [{quoted}](name=Riot OwleyCat,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mQANIqOA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-26T23:55:59.826+0000)
>
> Evelynn loves you, too <3

"love"
Also, what happened to her taking a lot of effort to move like that in heels??

"It takes a lot of effort to move like this in heels."
Where is this line.
The best part of any VGU for me are the interactions videos and the banter and depth characters give to each other. That and the uh actual VGU...

They're embarassing. I don't want others to listen to me playing a game with those voicelines, not because they are "sexy"..... but because they are so juvenile that it's embarassing.

 But I guess for the target audience of this game, they sound cool.

> [{quoted}](name=LunSeiSleidee,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mQANIqOA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-09-27T08:07:09.374+0000)
>
>  But I guess for the target audience of this game, they sound cool.

This coming from someone scared to have his mommy and daddy hear naughty words.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

> [{quoted}](name=Vhan8765,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mQANIqOA,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-09-27T08:41:01.039+0000)
>
> This coming from someone scared to have his mommy and daddy hear naughty words.
> {{sticker:sg-lulu}}


Yeah, I'm kinda scared my mommy and daddy would think I returned a teenager.
Don't know if is too much but I really want a new one that when she gets stunned by {{champion:44}} she goes: "Spank me!" xD
